title: Jiří Lukavský
text:
I am interested in human vision, attention and memory.

If you see a photograph, what do you actually remember? Can you pay attention to multiple objects simultaneously? What is the attention and what is a strategy?
See also my personal page.

Scholar - Github - Mastodon - OSF

title: Vision Labels
text:
Vision science research group within LABELS laboratory - joint lab of the Institute of Psychology, Czech Academy of Sciences and Faculty of Arts, Charles University.
We are interested in a variety of topics, ranging from eye-tracking and attention research to the scene perception and memory. We combine experimental research with computational modelling.
More about our team
